full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA YON TAN RIN PO CHE SDUD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @107A *, ,'PHAGS MA BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA'I RJES SU @107B 'BRANG BA'I BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA YON TAN RIN PO CHE BSDUD PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KHYED SKU CI 'DRA DANG, ,ZHES PA NAS, CHOS DANG BKRA SHIS 'PHEL BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,STON PA 'JIG RTEN KHAMS SU 'BYON PA DANG, ,BSTAN PA NYI 'OD BZHIN DU GSAL BA DANG, ,BSTAN 'DZIN PHU NU BZHUN DU @108A *, ,MTHUN PA YIS, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,, *, ,AOm SVASTI, RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI RAB DANG PHUL, ,SHER PHYIN MDO MCHOG BSDUD PA'I GLEGS BAM 'DI, ,RAB DKAR DANG LDAN RNAMS KYIS CHOS SBYIN MCHOG ,RGYA CHER SPEL PHYIR KHAL KHA KHU RE CHE'I, ,CHOS GRVA CHEN PO KUNo DGA'o CHOSo @108B GLING DU, ,SPAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE MTHUS RGYAL BSTAN DAR, ,^DAM PA'I ZHABS BRTAN 'BREL THOG GTZO BYAS PA'I, ,'GRO KUN RING MIN BYANG CHEN THOB GYUR CIG ,MKHAS MA BLOo GSALo KUNo DGA'o CHOSo KYI GLINGo, ,SRID MTHAR DAR RGYAS YUN RING GNAS PA DANG, ,BLO GSAL MKHAS MANG TSOGS KYIS YONGS GANG BAS, ,THUB BSTAN PHYOGS KUN RGYAS PA'I GZHIR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
